#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cctype>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
cin.tie(NULL);
    int x;
    cin >> x;
    while(x--)
    {
        string a;
        cin >> a;
        int ave = 0;
        int arr[26] = {0};
        int val = a.length();
        for(int x = 0; x < val; x++)
                ave+=int(a[x]);
        cout << char(ave/val) << "\n";

    }
  return 0;
}
